# TodoApp
Template: saas | Generated: 2025-12-23T05:10:05.392Z

## Overview
A simple todo list application where users can create, edit, and delete tasks. Include user authentication and the ability to mark tasks as complete.

## Architecture
Pages: /|/dashboard|/settings
Components: TaskList|TaskDetails|TaskCreate|TaskEdit|SettingsForm
API: POST /api/auth|GET /api/tasks|POST /api/tasks|PUT /api/tasks/:id|DELETE /api/tasks/:id|GET /api/settings|PUT /api/settings

## Stack
Next.js 15 App Router|TypeScript strict|Tailwind|React 19 Server Components
Integrations: - **auth**: supabase
- **db**: supabase

## Code Style
TS: strict, interfaces, avoid anyâ†’unknown
React: server default|"use client" for onClick/forms/useState/useEffect/browser-APIs|async server-side
Files: pagesâ†’app/[route]/page.tsx|componentsâ†’components/[name].tsx|APIâ†’app/api/[route]/route.ts|typesâ†’types/|utilsâ†’lib/
Style: Tailwind utilities, mobile-first
Data: server=async/await|client=hooks/SWR|errors=try/catch|loading=Suspense

## Patterns
{integration-specific patterns}

## Tasks
Pageâ†’app/[route]/page.tsxâ†’server componentâ†’layoutsâ†’nav
Componentâ†’components/Name.tsxâ†’propsâ†’implementâ†’export
APIâ†’app/api/route.tsâ†’GET|POSTâ†’validationâ†’NextResponse.json

## Env
Required: {env vars from integrations}

## Next
{suggested next steps}

AI: Follow style|maintain consistency|clarify ambiguity|prioritize types+errors|simple components|test critical paths

# TodoApp
A simple todo list application where users can create, edit, and delete tasks. Include user authentication and the ability to mark tasks as complete.

## Generated
Scaffolded via **Dawson Framework** (saas) + AI architecture.

### Structure
Pages: /|/dashboard|/settings | Components: TaskList|TaskDetails|TaskCreate|TaskEdit|SettingsForm | API: POST /api/auth|GET /api/tasks|POST /api/tasks|PUT /api/tasks/:id|DELETE /api/tasks/:id|GET /api/settings|PUT /api/settings

### Integrations
- **auth**: supabase
- **db**: supabase

## Setup
```bash
cp .env.example .env.local  # Add: {env vars}
npm install && npm run dev
```
